text:
─────Yeah, that's good!
It looks great on you～

Make sure you become a hit, okay Nichika-chan?
Then I can wear a smug look all I want.

There it is～ I guess you're one of those people 
that wants to brag about how "I raised that girl."

Ehh, let me get away with saying that sort of thing～!
Indulge this old timer～

Nichika, I had something I wanted to confirm ──────
.........Oh

Hey, Producer-san!
Nichika-chan looks so cute, right?
Yes, I think it suits her very well.

Um, we're in the middle of fitting, so...!
Can you do this later?

O-Of course...
Sorry, I'll see you later then...!
